keyMoments.title: Reveals the Truth About Otohime's Killer
keyMoments.description: Shirahoshi publicly reveals that Megalo witnessed Hody Jones shooting Queen Otohime ten years ago, exposing the truth that Hody framed a human pirate for the assassination.
keyMoments.significance: This is a pivotal moment showing Shirahoshi's incredible strength and marks her breaking the silence she maintained for ten years. It exposes Hody's manipulation and deception to all of Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.quote: Megalo witnessed everything that happened on that fateful day. He told me because he was part of Neptune's army and saw it all.

keyMoments.title: Explains Her Promise to Queen Otohime
keyMoments.description: Shirahoshi recounts her mother's dying wish that she not harbor hatred toward her killer. Despite knowing the truth since age six, she honored this promise for ten years.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Shirahoshi's emotional maturity and commitment to her mother's ideals of peace and forgiveness. Shows her character is far stronger than her fearful demeanor suggests.
keyMoments.quote: Mother told me not to bear any grudge towards my killer. I promised her, and I've kept that secret ever since.

reveals.information: Shirahoshi has known that Hody Jones killed her mother for ten years but kept it secret to honor her mother's wish not to harbor hatred

keyMoments.title: Emerges from Megalo's Mouth
keyMoments.description: Luffy dramatically emerges from inside Megalo's mouth onto Gyoncorde Plaza, having been hidden there as part of Jinbe's rescue plan.
keyMoments.significance: This is the climactic hero entrance that the entire arc has been building toward, fulfilling the citizens' desperate hope for salvation.

keyMoments.title: Kicks Hody with Gear 2
keyMoments.description: Luffy activates Gear Second and delivers a powerful kick to Hody Jones, sending him flying through the plaza walls in his first direct attack on the antagonist.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Luffy's increased strength after the two-year time skip and marks the beginning of the final battle. The animation quality of this moment was particularly praised.

keyMoments.title: Asks the Citizens: Friend or Foe?
keyMoments.description: Standing before the assembled citizens with his crew, Luffy poses the question of whether the Straw Hats are friends or enemies to Fish-Man Island, leaving the decision to the people.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's maturity in understanding that true alliance must be chosen freely. Addresses the core theme of trust between species.
keyMoments.quote: Are we friends or foes? That's for you to decide!

abilities.description: Luffy uses Gear Second to enhance his speed and power, delivering a devastating kick to Hody Jones.

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Exposed as Queen Otohime's True Killer
keyMoments.description: Shirahoshi reveals that Hody Jones assassinated Queen Otohime and framed a human pirate for the crime, exposing his deception to all of Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: This revelation exposes Hody's manipulation and shows that he manufactured the hatred and conflict between humans and fish-men for his own purposes.

keyMoments.title: Decides to Execute Neptune Immediately
keyMoments.description: After being exposed, Hody mocks Shirahoshi and decides to execute King Neptune ahead of schedule rather than waiting.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Hody's cruelty and contempt for the ideals of peace. This decision forces Luffy's intervention.
keyMoments.quote: How foolish! Your actions were meaningless. I'll kill the king right now!

reveals.information: Hody Jones killed Queen Otohime ten years ago and framed a human pirate for the assassination

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Witness to Otohime's Assassination
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that Megalo, as a former Neptune Army pet, witnessed Hody Jones shooting Queen Otohime and told Shirahoshi the truth in secret.
keyMoments.significance: Megalo's testimony (through Shirahoshi) is the key evidence that exposes Hody's crime and the decade-long deception.

keyMoments.title: Spits Out Luffy at the Critical Moment
keyMoments.description: Megalo struggles for a few moments before spitting Luffy out onto Gyoncorde Plaza, revealing that he had been hiding Luffy inside his mouth as part of Jinbe's rescue plan.
keyMoments.significance: Megalo plays a crucial tactical role in the rescue operation, demonstrating his loyalty to Shirahoshi and the kingdom.

reveals.information: Megalo witnessed Hody Jones assassinating Queen Otohime ten years ago and told Shirahoshi
